website_summaries.verdict: A good value on a cooler from Coleman. Not fancy, but gets the job done.
pros: Spigot allows for easy draining of melted ice
Lightweight, but still works efficiently to keep food cool
Handles slide and pivot to make this cooler easier to carry
cons: The hinges on the lid are plastic and not as sturdy as other Coleman models

customer_reviews.title: Lid isn't insulated! Don't buy unless you want a project.
customer_reviews.text: How is it that the free foam coolers from the steak subscription places are better at keeping things cold than a Coleman cooler? I'll tell you. It's because Coleman didn't think anyone would notice that they decided not to insulate the lid. I spent the weekend after my camping trip drilling holes into the cooler and filling the lid with spray foam. Shame on you Coleman, your name on a product used to mean something...
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie the photo girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I recently went on a trip. This cooler was able to fit 30 cans and 6 bottles of beverages within ice. The ice stayed frozen 2 days and when the ice melted, the water stayed cold two additional days. The cooler has nice, rotatable handles and a little plug to let water out easily without having to take anything out of the cooler. I highly suggest this for camping trips, road trips, or any trip!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Mash Tun
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up to use as a mash tun instead of a round 10 gallon cooler for home brewing, as I wanted the larger capacity (i.e. 12 gal. vs 10 gal.). Plug was easy to remove to install 1/2 stainless steel valve and bazooka screen. So far I have used it to brew three all grain batches and it has held the temperature well. As other reviewers have noted, the hinges are kind of flimsy. I removed them to make it easier to add grain and sparge water and simply place the lid on the cooler while mashing.
customer_reviews.author: hagendas

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the price point but the thing really doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: not bad for the price point but the thing really doesn't use hinges - the lid is attached using thin plastic rectangles attached to the back edge of the lid and to the top edge of the body. Have to be careful how far back you open the lid because this stresses those plastic "hinges" and it looks like you could easily break them if you push it very far up and back. But as I said, it works fine considering how inexpensive it was.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Shehan

customer_reviews.title: Nice size cooler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace out 1970 Coleman cooler that was in great condition except for the handle on one side. That was an awesome cooler. Amazing the difference in quality though. This was nice, but you can really tell the difference in craftsmanship. But all in all still a good sized cooler. Hope we can have it as long as the last golden yellow 1970 cooler :).
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: Great, green buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler! I purchased it to haul my cold and frozen items home from ALDI in the warmer months, rather than fussing with a bunch of little plastic bags. I only go out about every two months to shop, so this is absolutely perfect for my needs and it was a great price, too. Really love the green color scheme. Will also use to keep drinks on the porch for delivery drivers and workers this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Water proof, mouse proof storage
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these, I've liked them so much. I use them as water proof, mice proof storage of medical supplies in my basement. They work perfectly for that. I would buy them again. My son owns 2 as well, which he brings camping and to parties, as well as to protect his good in power outtages.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Marie Lambrianou

customer_reviews.title: Green!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! This cooler is very, very spacious. As some have mentioned, the hinge seems a little weak and will probably break relatively soon if I am not careful with it. Was a little disappointed to see some shoddy factory work on the handles, although it mostly seems cosmetic (you can see a bit of glue/foam on each handle).
customer_reviews.author: Jay Nebulae

customer_reviews.title: Worth $25ish delivered
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Warnings, Lid is attached via plastic flex hinges... they will surely break eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Softkiss

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Perfoance Cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking the name brand would be good. First of all I got one that was obviously returned because half the sticky label was on it and the rest of it was in the bottom of the box rolled up. Then I could barely open it. Needed to pry it open. Very unhappy I guess you get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Iorio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a air conditioner cooler with ice packs and a fan, price was right and stays cold for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Kept ice for almost three days outside, this is a great cooler. For everyone complaining about the hinges, yea it’s true the lid doesn’t stay up by itself but for this price and for how long the cooler will stay cold, it’s really just a minor inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Coleman quality his really fallen. The drain is so high up it leaves about 2 inches of water in the cooler still have to tilt it. The plastic hinge is a joke. The lid will not stay up to fill or get anything out. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Little

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice, big cooler. Quiet hinges. Drain plug on one side. Sliding, pivoting handles. Same size as the classic red and blue ones that have been around forever, just not as glaring when you're in the woods. Speaking of which, the colors in the photo are a little misleading, because the lid looks pretty white and it's actually much more of a beige/tan. I almost didn't buy it because it looked white, but I trusted the color description and I'm glad I did. For under twenty-five bucks shipped, you're not going to find a nicer cooler anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: Cooler top is not white
customer_reviews.text: The product pictures make the cooler top look white, but it is in fact ... tan. Not a huge deal, but not what was expected. Going camping this weekend and will update with any changes to my review relative to performance.
customer_reviews.author: jamesblanc

customer_reviews.title: Great ice chest for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight cooler we use on our boat. Keeps a bag of ice for a day or two which is perfect for our day trips on the boat. Great ice chest for the price. This is not a Max ice chest to keep things cold for days / week. But keeps ice for us in Arizona heat for the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler for the price. We have to drive 2-3 hours to shop sometimes, and this keeps everything very cold until we get home. I was surprised! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: MSCudd

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the color but it was damaged....color scraped. Came in a huge box and too inconvenient to return. Besides, I needed to use it right away. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this cooler because I have other Coleman coolers and they are very reliable. I bought this one as a gift. I have 2 Coleman coolers and they have been great over the past 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: baby girl

customer_reviews.title: Top Won't Stay Open
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for one specific event. You clearly get what you pay for as it is pretty cheaply made. My main complaint is that the top would not stay open. When trying to fill it or empty it, the top kept closing.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 days in Texas summer.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. 3 days in Houston Texas July weather and still had ice. I did cool it down with a sacrificial bag of ice night before trip. I also did keep it in shade and drained water regularly from the spout. with out doing all that you will still get 2 days if it is totally full of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Like the color.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 2 people camping. Nice color and keeps stuff cold for roughly 2 days depending on environment and ice storage.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this cooler
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time for groceries and what not it is very hot in the desert. It has been awesome! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy For Short Term Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight cooler that probably won't keep ice more then a day or 2 in Texas heat - plan on using it to keep meat cool overnight after a deer hunt - would not recommend for longer then a day or 2 otherwise a good buy
customer_reviews.author: forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the price on this!! Great value!! Used for a weekend camping trip, kept things very cold!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Colson

customer_reviews.title: Coolest cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Keeps ice cold for at least 3 days (don’t open too often) and the drain is such a key feature!
customer_reviews.author: hilary

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: For half the price of a red or blue cooler I can deal with green. It works just as good. Kept ice all weekend while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaire

customer_reviews.title: Durable and nice size!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for hurricane season to toss water and ice in. No hurricane thank goodness but have used twice at beach. Keeps nice and cool!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea F

customer_reviews.title: Does not ice
customer_reviews.text: We loaded the cooler with ice and drinks at 6:00 am and when we went to get stuff out around 10:30 or 11:00, half the ice was already melted. By 1:00 it was just cold water. The coolers were kept under the shade the whole time. Pathetic. We bought two of them and both of them were the exact same.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Just getting things together for our summer vacations. Cooler will fit nicely where we want it in our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Holds ice really well for the price. I like the dark green color because it doesn't stand out so much.
customer_reviews.author: Asahi

customer_reviews.title: Hinges are solid plastic with no pin
customer_reviews.text: Hinges are cheap and will probably fail with repeated use
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these coolers and the very first time we used them the handle broke off as I was carrying it. One cooler had drinks and one had food but neither were heavy enough that the handle should have broken off so easily. By the time we used them I was out of the return window so now I'm stuck with a broken-handled cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McElrath

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,strong and pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong cooler,shipping is fast too...and the color is awesome ,thank you !!!thumps up
customer_reviews.author: Walexsa

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's ok it's what you pay for it seems to be a little cheap made but will work for my use
customer_reviews.author: Brian Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Opened package, missing handle. Needed it next day.
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time but was missing the left handle. No where to be found in package. Returned since I needed a cooler the next day and just don’t have time to wait...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fuqua-smith

customer_reviews.title: $20 cooler. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Still using the first one I bought 12 yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S

customer_reviews.title: love the color but...
customer_reviews.text: love the color and size however the handles came off within the first use! now it is impossible to move once it has ice and beverages inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t stay open!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, light. But it’s a pain in the neck that the lid does not stay open while you load it! You have to put something for weight on it to keep it open. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: MJordan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap and poorly designed. The handles are awkward and the one handle broke after only careying two gallons of milk and some ice. The lid also doesn't stay open, it has to be held open because of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: So tiny
customer_reviews.text: This was so tiny I never expected it to be so small
customer_reviews.author: Debra marion

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We made a cross country trip, this held up great
customer_reviews.author: Michele Ebberts

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the money in
customer_reviews.text: It works good for the money but only keeps ice for a day and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Slater

customer_reviews.title: Good Cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, does what a cooler should do. Minus 1 star for delivery/replacement issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Week handles
customer_reviews.text: TOne of the handles broke off the first time I used it.............and no, it wasn't too heavy, we are a couple of old folks, so rally can't lift anything too heavy.............just saying!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was nice, but it didn't keep my ice bags cold for more than 45 mins. Not a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food cold, ice frozen. The drain is a big plus. Lots of room inside for a long weekend camping trip. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: janfTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke but I fixed it with gorilla glue and a dowel. I’ll probably replace with rope soon
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for John Boat, fits perfect behind seats for fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husbands john boat, for fishing. He did all the research and measured what he needed and this was it. He says its perfect for fishing. The only complaint is the lid not staying open long enough to put fish in. But he can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: CRL

customer_reviews.title: Kept everything cold for 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a shelf. But worked great for the price a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 of these coolers 1 was in great condition 1 was crushed not unusable but appearance is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these coolers 1 was in great condition 1 was crushed not unusable but appearance is very very poor..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but tight
customer_reviews.text: Super cooler but the lid fits soooo tight you have to really work to get it open!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Bought for auction gift and want one of my own
customer_reviews.author: Jane Moose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hinges!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this cooler, hinges are very cheap hard to stay open, bottom line you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Got this for camping and my Florida State Militia training weekends and when deployed to give aide in hurricane aftermath. Serves purpose well. Keeps items cold for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Basic camping cooler, really stays cold even after a day.
customer_reviews.author: A James

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job but kind of on the cheaper end of quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Renata OGarro

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: After less than 4 months of occasional light use, one of the handles is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas F.

customer_reviews.title: Handle missing
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that when I received my new cooler it was missing a handle. The shipping box was not damaged but the cooler itself was missing a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a very functional cooler. ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very functional cooler. The drain is one of the main reasons we chose this Coleman cooler over other choices. You can find a more quality built coolers but at a much elevated price point. Feel this will serve ours needs for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence L Evans

customer_reviews.title: I’m a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Heaven duty and nice! I used it once on a weekend camping trip, and it kept thing pretty cold, and even doubled as an extra chair. I’m happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Luke Melrose

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my items cold or frozen for at least 12 hours.
customer_reviews.text: this shouldn't even be called a cooler. It came nowhere near what they advertised. If you want something to stay frozen for even 12 hours, this is not the cooler for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ginn

customer_reviews.title: It has held up nicely and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this cooler for fishing every weekend. It has held up nicely and is easy to clean. Definitely the best value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value the hinges are plastic but for the price will make a nice bait well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S Neal

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this all summer as a work cooler. Works great and nothing has broke. I put new ice in every other day and its good to go. I also bought this for the color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: it is not in there so looks like it was never attached
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and one of the handles was missing! Didnt even fall off in the box, it is not in there so looks like it was never attached. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hohnstadt

customer_reviews.title: I love itt
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! just be careful with the handles!
customer_reviews.author: Baby Luna

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: nice cooler for the price. no bells or whistles on this thing... it just works well for the price! i'm sure there are cheaper ones but i wanted this "tacticool" green color! Ha!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with a coleman cooler. Great color scheme on this one also. Took it on a few canoe camping trips and it's held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Akil Harris

customer_reviews.title: my deck cooler
customer_reviews.text: just what i needed for my mountain home. good size ,very tight lid ,handles to carry it and a drain to empty it .
customer_reviews.author: ang nc

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn't stay open on it's own, but other than that it does it's job. I used it for a fraternity formal and it was decently easy to sand down.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: They send you whatever. Not what the description says ...
customer_reviews.text: They send you whatever. Not what the description says. It says camouflage with drain, and i received blue without drain
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer.
customer_reviews.text: The color is good, the handles are good, it cools well, the drain thingy works really well. Used it at the beach, bbqs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Nice item...no matter the use
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this to make a feral cat shelter..the medium size and the hinged detachable lid were nice assets. It is heavy enough not to move in the wind and provide shelter from snow and wind. This is a unique use, I understand, but I think it would be a equally as useful as a cooler for food and beverage. Not nearly as heavy as I anticipated..
customer_reviews.author: Deb, etc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keep items cold in the bed of my truck on a 14 hour road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor handle construction
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic. Thin Insulation Walls. Poor handle construction. Came completely missing one handle. Had to return. Expected much better quality from a Coleman brand.
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: the hinges are not that good. other then that it does the job
customer_reviews.text: the hinges are not that good. other then that it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: chew10s

customer_reviews.title: Olive Green
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice olive green color, and cools fairly well. I bought this mainly for shopping seafood and fresh produce. It has a fair amount of space and it fits well at the back of my car (sedan). What I don't like about it is that it is hard to open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: gabazero

customer_reviews.title: pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: the hinges are really generic to the point where it feels like the lid will fall off before too long. it kept stuff reasonably cold though which, i guess, is what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: alkaline

customer_reviews.title: Colman 48 cooler
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's a cooler and it's a Coleman. I put a frozen ice pack into the bottom and drive 45 min to Costco for steaks, etc. and they are cold when I get them home. I give it an an excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: lid is weak. I bought it as a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: lid is weak. I bought it as a replacement for the cooler that is used as a step into the interior of my boat (catalina 22), which came with a teak step board on the lid to spread the weight. This cooler is the proper size, but the lid isn't meant to be a step for an adult. Hopefully gluing something on the lid will spread the weight out and keep the lid from failing. It is a cheap cooler, priced appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: john williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad I have to say about this cooler. We went camping and it worked very well for what we needed it for. It's strong, the handles feel sturdy and I didn't notice any give when I used it for a chair (which happened a lot, n I weigh 210lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Yamasaki

customer_reviews.title: hard 2 open, but good price
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open. Grip slot is slick. Good price though. Next time, I will buy a cooler that I can open with 1 hand. You will definitely need 2 hands to open this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: CROGMAN

customer_reviews.title: unusual use
customer_reviews.text: I got this to house an outdoor cat in the winter. Cut a 6 inch round hole in the front, put in some blankets and it works great. Being able to open the top makes cleaning a breeze. Keeps the cat warm.
customer_reviews.author: Timkc

customer_reviews.title: Good basic cooler
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Kept drinks cold for 2 days. Nice that it had a drain
customer_reviews.author: An101

product_meta.title: Coleman Performance Portable Cooler, 48 Quart, Green - 3000000021
product_meta.description: Keep food and beverages cold during outdoor gatherings with the Coleman 48-Quart Performance Cooler. Ideal for camping trips, tailgating parties, and outdoor barbecues, this portable cooler combines a rugged, leak-resistant design with a generous 63-can capacity. Tall enough to accommodate 2-liter bottles upright, the cooler provides ample space for barbecue ingredients, perishable food, drinks, and more. The leak-resistant drain allows you to easily empty excess water without tilting the cooler, while the hinged lid opens effortlessly with one hand. Sporting a green and tan finish, this heavy-duty cooler blends into natural surroundings, making it ideal for hunting and fishing. When it's time to pack up, 2-way handles offer a firm handhold for easy lifting and carrying.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty cooler offers a spacious 48-quart capacity in a compact, portable design
Tall enough to accommodate multiple 2-liter bottles upright
Leak-resistant threaded drain empties excess water without any tilting
2-way handles offer a comfortable grip for easy transport
Green and tan finish ideal for hunting and fishing

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
